paramInformation.label: Color Temperature
paramInformation.description: Values range from 0 to 100 where 0 is cold white and 100 is warm white.

paramInformation.label: Shock Sensor Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: Range from 0 to 31 where 0 is minimum sensitivity and 31 is maximum sensitivity.

paramInformation.label: Strobe Light Interval
paramInformation.description: Values range from 0 to 25 in intervals of 100 milliseconds.

paramInformation.label: Strobe Light Pulse Count
paramInformation.description: Values range from 0 to 250 and a special value 255 which sets infinite flashing.
